displayBio.en: Wang Guangle (born 1976, Songxi) graduated from the Central Academy of Fine Arts in Beijing in 2000. He is best known for his process-based abstract painting, which is situated between realism and abstraction. Wang lives and works in Beijing.
displayBio.zh-hant: 王光樂（1976年生於松溪，現於北京生活及工作），2000年畢業於中央美術學院，以一系列強調過程、介乎寫實與抽象之間的抽象油畫見長。
